name: The Explorer (JamesRichardBradley)
description:
The Explorer [ALPHA]:

WIP Concept work for a University project on Procedural Generation.

Find the Planet with your objective, then collect the anomalies present on the planet.  [NOTE:  There are many bugs present.  If you find yourself stuck or glitched in a way that makes the game unplayable, please close the application and relaunch.}

Controls are aimed towards Gamepads (such as XBox 360 / PS4 controllers) but keyboard functionality is present.
